directions: Place the ice, banana liqueur, creme de cacao, ice cream, chocolate syrup, vanilla extract, milk, and banana into a blender. Cover, and puree until smooth. Pour into glasses, and garnish with whipped cream and chocolate shavings to serve.
ingredients: 4 (1.5 fluid ounce) jiggers creme de cacao liqueur
title: Vacation Chocolate Monkey Shake
